description: Monitor metrics for node.js and express router status.

targets.expr:
(
    (
        sum(http_request_duration_ms_bucket{le="50.0", code=~"^2..$"}) / 1000
        + (
            sum(http_request_duration_ms_bucket{le="150.0", code=~"^2..$"}) / 1000
            - sum(http_request_duration_ms_bucket{le="50.0", code=~"^2..$"}) / 1000
        ) / 2
        + (
            sum(http_request_duration_ms_bucket{le="500.0", code=~"^2..$"}) / 1000
            - sum(http_request_duration_ms_bucket{le="150.0", code=~"^2..$"}) / 1000
        ) / 3
        + (
            sum(http_request_duration_ms_bucket{le="1000.0", code=~"^2..$"}) / 1000
            - sum(http_request_duration_ms_bucket{le="500.0", code=~"^2..$"}) / 1000
        ) / 4
    )
    / sum(http_request_duration_ms_count{code=~"^2..$"})
) * 100

panels.title: Apdex Score: target $target s, tolerated $tolerated s

title: Demo Neptune Grafana Dashboard
